mapper.insert: insert into chatroom_member ( chatroom_idx, user_idx, last_read_msg_idx, start_msg_idx ) values ( #{chatroom_idx}, #{user_idx}, #{last_read_msg_idx}, #{start_msg_idx} )
mapper.select: select last_msg_idx from chat_room where chatroom_idx = #{chatroom_idx};

select start_msg_idx, last_read_msg_idx, chat_room.chatroom_idx, chat_room.last_msg_idx from chatroom_member left join chat_room on chatroom_member.chatroom_idx = chat_room.chatroom_idx where user_idx = #{user_idx};
